name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior PCB Engineer with 13+ years of experience in PCB Design and production processes, proficient in **Altium**, **Cadstar**, **Allegro**, and **PADS**. Adept in implementing **EMC**, **Signal Integrity**, and **Power Integrity** strategies to enhance design quality and performance. Demonstrated analytical and problem-solving skills with a solid understanding of IPC Standards and thermal simulation techniques.

In my previous roles, I successfully collaborated with cross-functional teams while guiding junior engineers as a mentor, ensuring high standards are maintained in project execution. Additionally, I possess strong communication skills in English, which enable effective interactions with stakeholders across various domains.
